title: When you see a Top lane Nami, and you think you will have an easy lane
body:
But the fish makes you look like chum:
http://25.media.tumblr.com/03b5aa8d2b6f5b393d1ebf9680310786/tumblr_mxutuwptNm1sqn4wyo1_400.gif

Well done Aopenmind!

replies.body: aww shucks, it was fun match!

How did you solve the mana problem?.

When I tried Nami top, the third time I disengaged from that Xin Zhao, I was already out of mana, just from trying to keep myself alive.

> [{quoted}](name=Orangesilk,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=El29eqMW,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-25T16:58:52.653+0000)
>
> How did you solve the mana problem?.
> 
> When I tried Nami top, the third time I disengaged from that Xin Zhao, I was already out of mana, just from trying to keep myself alive.

Actually I didn't have much mana problems, when you tried it what skills did you max? If im playing top I max her e first

> [{quoted}](name=Orangesilk,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=El29eqMW,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-07-25T16:58:52.653+0000)
>
> How did you solve the mana problem?.
> 
> When I tried Nami top, the third time I disengaged from that Xin Zhao, I was already out of mana, just from trying to keep myself alive.

Usually take a hybrid rune page and build according to whoever I'm facing
Just Athene. Tear is an option too, but doesn't really kick off until later.
When you get a quadra kill with your ult and proceed to get the penta with full ap nami {{champion:267}}

Full AP Nami isn't a joke, I'm surprised I don't see it more like AP Sona. Both Sona and Nami have so much utility, and they scale really well with damage. Sona is a burst mage that can literally one shot people with 0 counterplay but even if she gets behind she has a crap ton of utility, and Nami has so much AoE on top of her CC and really nice sustain.

Supports > Everyone else
Sion > Supports > Everyone else.
{{champion:119}} > {{champion:119}} > Everyone

When my friend goes around with Sion, he likes to yell "YOU DIDN'T BRING ENOUGH PEOPLE!" when he charges into the enemy team, because it takes a good 3-4 people to kill a Sion in a reasonable amount of time. Sion is so goddamn tanky, it's amazing. The tanky meta really benefited him since he plays tanky champions pretty well.
I love tanks man!

Full AP Soraka heals so much on her Q she's basically Swain in teamfights. It's hilarious.

Still kinda sucks, though.

> [{quoted}](name=Noble Absolution,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=El29eqMW,comment-id=000300000002,timestamp=2015-07-26T15:40:54.585+0000)
>
> Full AP Soraka heals so much on her Q she's basically Swain in teamfights. It's hilarious.
> 
> Still kinda sucks, though.

Or her 700 w heals.
except that they are shit... they are as bad as teemo
Nami is one of the few champs that give me a feeling of dread when I see her in the loading screen. You just know that lane is gonna be rough.
wanna now who the best support is in leauge
{{champion:143}}
As long as Rito fixes her little kinks here and there. She's my favorite champion, but I cringe when her plants prioritize minions instead of champions. Especially when they have ONE. HIT. LEFT.

I hadn't noticed it yet, but I recently got one of those cases where her plant took at least 2 seconds to find its target to attack. Iron out the bugs, like they did Syndra, and she be in a way better place.
the best support is sona or leona for ranked 5v5

Full AP Ebb'n'Flow.
Git rekt.
here i am lol'ing so hard at that gif
Again, fucking {{champion:267}} and her Tidal Wave!
